hero.title: Empowering Women Through
hero.description1: EmpowerHerEd is more than just a learning platform - it's a pathway to support, teach, and fund young women in Rwanda. Our mission is to bridge the gender gap in technology by providing women with the knowledge, resources, and confidence they need to thrive in the digital world.
hero.description2: Join Rwanda's premier digital education platform. Learn from industry experts, connect with mentors, and launch your tech career. Whether you're just starting out or looking to enhance your skills, we're here to guide your journey.

hero.title: About
hero.description: Empowering women through technology, education, and community support.

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: EmpowerHerEd was born from a simple but powerful idea: when women are educated and empowered, entire communities prosper. Founded by a passionate team of educators, mentors, and advocates, EmpowerHerEd exists to bridge the gender gap in education and opportunity.
story.description2: Our platform is a safe, inclusive space where women and girls can learn, connect, and grow academically, professionally, and personally.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: We offer curated educational content, mentorship programs, workshops, and career support to help women at every stage of their journey. From high school students to working professionals, we're here to uplift, equip, and empower.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gender gap in technology by providing women with the skills, resources, and support they need to succeed in the tech industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where women are equally represented in technology and have the opportunity to shape the future of innovation.

whyItMatters.title: Why It Matters
whyItMatters.description: Despite progress, millions of women around the world still face limited access to education and leadership roles. EmpowerHerEd is changing that by nurturing confidence, capability, and community.
whyItMatters.highlight: Together, we are shaping a future where education is a right and not a privilege for every woman.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These core values guide everything we do at EmpowerHerEd

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We believe in empowering women through education and skill development.

community.description: Building a supportive network of women in tech who lift each other up.

innovation.description: Fostering creativity and innovation in technology through diverse perspectives.

hero.title: Success Stories
hero.description: Discover how EmpowerHerEd has transformed lives and created opportunities for women in Rwanda.

marie.name: Marie Uwimana
marie.quote: EmpowerHerEd gave me the skills and confidence to pursue my dream career in tech. The mentorship and support were invaluable.
marie.story: After completing the coding bootcamp, I secured a position as a junior developer at a local tech company. The practical skills and real-world projects prepared me well for the industry.

grace.name: Grace Mukamana
grace.quote: The business development program helped me turn my small idea into a thriving enterprise.
grace.story: With the knowledge gained from EmpowerHerEd's business program, I successfully launched my own fashion brand, creating employment opportunities for other women in my community.

sarah.name: Sarah Niyonsenga
sarah.quote: The leadership training empowered me to make a real difference in my community.
sarah.story: Through the community leadership program, I learned how to organize and mobilize resources effectively. Now I'm leading initiatives that support education and women's empowerment in my district.

claire.name: Claire Uwase
claire.quote: The data analysis program opened up a whole new world of opportunities for me.
claire.story: After completing the data science track, I joined a research institute where I'm now working on projects that use data to improve healthcare delivery in rural communities.

joyce.name: Joyce Mutoni
joyce.quote: The combination of technical skills and business training was exactly what I needed.
joyce.story: I developed a mobile app that connects farmers with markets, and with the support from EmpowerHerEd's entrepreneurship program, I've grown it into a successful startup.

esther.name: Esther Mukamana
esther.quote: The digital skills program helped me pivot my career during the pandemic.
esther.story: I transitioned from traditional marketing to digital marketing, and now I'm helping local businesses establish their online presence and reach new customers.

alice.name: Alice Uwamahoro
alice.quote: The design program helped me combine my creativity with technical skills.
alice.story: I now lead the design team at a tech startup, creating user-friendly interfaces for mobile applications that serve local communities.

beatrice.name: Beatrice Nyirahabimana
beatrice.quote: The cybersecurity training opened doors to a field I never thought I could enter.
beatrice.story: After completing the program, I joined a financial institution's security team, where I help protect customer data and prevent cyber threats.

diane.name: Diane Uwase
diane.quote: The advanced tech program helped me pursue my passion for artificial intelligence.
diane.story: I'm now working on AI projects that help improve agricultural yields and predict weather patterns, making a real impact on farmers' lives.
